attributes.action: Increase the price of cigarettes to fund the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Raise the cost of cigarettes to a flat price of £10 per packet (of 20) in order to fund the NHS.  People choose to smoke and therefore choose to increase their chances of developing cancer.  I don't know what the cost of treating smoking related cancers is to the NHS but i'm sure it's a few hundred million pounds a year. Smokers should pay for this.
